name: IronBorn
description: What if you discovered that you have the power to stop an evil menace? What if you discovered that to complete that journey, you would have to face your own brother? Join Dale and his friends on a quest of self-discovery, friendship and heroism!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 2GHz or higher Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
